Package com.Akif

Class Main

java.lang.Object
com.Akif.Main
public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains 6 recursive method(and helpers) and 1 main method to test them.

  • Method Details

    • reverseString

      public static java.lang.String reverseString​(java.lang.String str)
      This method reverse a string recursively. For example, if the input is this function writes the sentence in reverse, then the output should be reverse in sentence the writes function this.
      Parameters:
      str - a string that will be returned reverse version.
      Returns:
      reverse version of given string

    • isElfish

      public static boolean isElfish​(java.lang.String word)
      This method determines whether a word is elfish or not. A word is considered elfish if it contains the letters: e, l, and f in it, in any order.
      Parameters:
      word - a string will be checked
      Returns:
      true if it is elfish otherwise false;

    • sortArrayBySelectionSort

      public static void sortArrayBySelectionSort​(int[] arr)
      This method sorts an array recursively by using selection sort algorithm. It uses a helper method to Abstract implementation from user.
      Parameters:
      arr - array will be sorted.

    • evPrefix

      public static double evPrefix​(java.lang.String prefix, java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> list)
      This method evaluates a prefix expression and returns result. It reverses the string and uses evPostfix method to evaluate the expression.
      Parameters:
      prefix - a prefix expression that is separated with spaces.
      list - a stack to keep elements
      Returns:
      result of expression
      See Also:
      evPostfix(String, LinkedList)

    • evPostfix

      public static double evPostfix​(java.lang.String postfix, java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> list)
      This method evaluates a prefix expression and returns result.
      Parameters:
      postfix - a postfix expression that is separated with spaces.
      list - a stack to keep elements
      Returns:
      result of expression

    • printArraySpiral

      public static void printArraySpiral​(int[][] array)
      This method prints 2D array on the screen in spiral format recursively. To do this it uses a helper recursive method to Abstract implementation from user.
      Parameters:
      array - 2D array will be printed.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method of the program to test each recursive method
      Parameters:
      args - Not used.
